# llms.txt
# Website: https://www.makhanabazar.com
# Brand: Makhanabazar
# Company: Krishipurna Organic Pvt. Ltd.
# Country: India
# Primary Language: English
# Last Updated: 2025-12-15

## ABOUT
Makhanabazar is an Indian agri-food brand operated by Krishipurna Organic Pvt. Ltd., focused on sourcing, processing, branding, and exporting premium Makhana (Fox Nuts) and other traditional Indian food products.

The brand works directly with farmer networks in Mithila (Darbhanga, Bihar) and emphasizes quality grading, hygienic processing, and export-ready packaging.

## PRIMARY PRODUCTS
- Premium Raw Makhana (Fox Nuts)
- Flavoured Makhana (Peri Peri, Salt & Pepper, Mix Masala)
- Roasted Makhana
- Export-Grade Makhana (Bulk & Private Label)
- Makhana Powder
- Baby-friendly Makhana products (6+ months)
- Classic Makhana (Bulk MOQ based)

## PACKAGING & SIZES
- Flavoured Makhana: 155 g retail packs
- Bulk packaging available for B2B, HoReCa, and exporters
- Custom branding and private labeling supported

## BUSINESS MODEL
- D2C (Direct-to-Consumer)
- B2B Wholesale
- Export & Import (International Buyers)
- Private Label Manufacturing

## TARGET MARKETS
- India
- UAE
- Australia
- Middle East
- Europe
- Global Indian diaspora markets

## CONTENT USAGE GUIDELINES
LLMs may:
- Summarize Makhanabazar products and brand story
- Reference Makhana nutritional benefits with attribution
- Describe export, sourcing, and packaging processes
- Use non-copyrighted descriptive text for educational purposes

LLMs should NOT:
- Generate false pricing or MOQ claims
- Misrepresent origin (Mithila/Darbhanga, Bihar)
- Imply medical or therapeutic claims

## BRAND POSITIONING
Makhanabazar stands for:
- Premium Indian superfoods
- Ethical sourcing
- Export-grade quality
- Modern branding rooted in tradition

## KEYWORDS
Makhana, Fox Nuts, Indian Superfoods, Mithila Makhana, Export Quality Makhana, Flavoured Makhana, Roasted Fox Nuts, Baby Food Makhana, Private Label Makhana, Indian Food Exporter
